name: Sports Rival Dudes: Ball Fight
description:
These friends are ready to take out some aggression on one another!

The goal in this game, as in any throwing fight, is to hit your enemy as hard as you can with the ball!

It is very easy to play, just press hard on your character to give him more strength. When you are ready just release to throw!

The goal is to hit your ""friend"" as much as possible!

Sounds easy? Prove it! Ready to have some fun?

Features include:

• Beautiful, fun graphics
• Smooth physics for nice gameplay
• Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
• Addictive gaming

Download right now!
